Title: Researching Post-Conflict Supply Chains
Description: In this study, we inspected the structure of agricultural supply chains in post-conflict Lebanon. Using qualitative interview data collected from local NGOs, we formulated a generalized humanitarian supply chain model adapted from commercial supply chain theory. The framework aims to enhance understanding of how post-conflict agricultural systems re-emerge and to inform the design of more resilient and effective humanitarian logistics interventions.
